description: This is a Flutter application main source file defining the app's entry point, main widget, home page, and UI structure.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget of the Flutter application, setting up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the main UI screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: The state class managing the UI for MyHomePage, building the scaffold and content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the Flutter application that runs MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, respectively.
